media:group.media:description:
üìç The United Kingdom-based Bank of Georgia Group finalized its $303.6 million acquisition of Ameriabank, one of Armenia‚Äôs largest lenders. üìç Armenia is in talks with Russia to encourage more investment in five enterprises that Yerevan previously handed over to Moscow as part of a debt forgiveness deal.

entry.title: Armenia‚Äôs parliament passes expanded domestic violence protections

media:group.media:title: Armenia‚Äôs parliament passes expanded domestic violence protections
media:group.media:description:
üìç In a rare admission of fault, Armenia‚Äôs National Security Service said an Armenian soldier broke protocol and crossed the border with Azerbaijan, resulting in an incident earlier this week that left one Azerbaijani soldier wounded. üìç Armenia‚Äôs parliament today gave final approval to a package of amendments and additions meant to strengthen the country‚Äôs domestic violence laws and extend protection for unmarried partners. üìç Deputy Foreign Minister Vahan Kostanyan expressed the Armenian government's concern with the ongoing property crisis in Jerusalem's Armenian Quarter, saying that there is an attempt underway to change the status quo. üìç Interview: ‚ÄòWe are here to stay,‚Äô pledge Jerusalem‚Äôs Armenians, as land conflict escalates- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4gHgCdhhf-I üìç Watch More: Simulated Mars mission brings Armenia one step closer to space- https://youtu.be/WBwtSdFVpV8

entry.title: Simulated Mars mission brings Armenia one step closer to space

media:group.media:title: Simulated Mars mission brings Armenia one step closer to space
media:group.media:description:
AMADEE-24, a month-long analog training mission for a future journey to Mars, wrapped up earlier this month in Armenia‚Äôs central Ararat region. Managed by the Austrian Space Forum, the mission brought six analog astronauts to Armenia to carry out an array of experiments, backed by hundreds of researchers and staff from more than two dozen countries. Participants told CivilNet the mission has been a catalyst for Armenia‚Äôs burgeoning domestic space industry, which is now setting its sights on producing its own spacesuits, supporting its own analog astronauts, and setting up the region‚Äôs first space laboratory.

entry.title: US ambassador: Washington may provide Armenia with armored ambulances

media:group.media:title: US ambassador: Washington may provide Armenia with armored ambulances
media:group.media:description:
üìç One Azerbaijani soldier was wounded in an exchange of fire between Armenian and Azerbaijani units that came after an Armenian shepherd inadvertently crossed the border while looking for his flock. üìç Armenia plans to send a military attach√© to its embassy in the United Kingdom, while India will reportedly appoint its own defense attach√© to its diplomatic mission in Yerevan. üìç The United States may provide Armenia with armored ambulances as part of ongoing defense discussions between the two countries. üìç Armenia remains the most democratic country in the South Caucasus, according to the Washington-based non-profit Freedom House.

media:group.media:title: Armenian Nobel Peace Prize
media:group.media:description:
In this week's episode of Insights, host Eric Hacopian unpacks the joint US, EU and Armenia meeting in Brussels. He also touches on the status of the Armenians imprisoned in Baku for over 6 months, including Ruben Vardanyan who has been nominated for the Nobel Peace Prize.
